title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: Digital Competency Development MOOC for Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic usage methods of social media tools in medical education contexts

Learners can present two or more interaction strategies between learners and instructors in digital environments

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
